instructions: Tap in the To field, then type the names of recipients. As you type, Mail automatically suggests people from your Contacts, along with email addresses for the people who have more than one email address. You can also tap the Add Contact button to open Contacts and add recipients from there. If you re sending a copy, tap the Cc/Bcc field. Tap in the Cc field, then enter the names of people you re sending a copy to. Tap in the Bcc field, then enter the names of people whose names you don t want other recipients to see.

Go to Settings > Passwords & Accounts > Add Account > Other. Tap Add Mail Account. Enter your name, email address, and password, then tap Next. Enter the names of the incoming and outgoing mail servers for your account and any other requested information. Tap Save.
Go to Settings > Mail > Signature. Tap in the text field at the top of the screen, then edit your signature.
